cases.title: Smith v. Jones
cases.summary: Established precedent for contract disputes in technology licensing agreements.
key_points: Implicit terms can be enforced when industry standards are clear
Technical specifications form binding parts of agreements
Cure periods must be reasonable for technical breaches

cases.title: Martin v. State
cases.summary: Key ruling on evidence admissibility for digital communications.
key_points: Metadata is admissible to authenticate digital communications
Chain of custody must be documented for digital evidence
Expert testimony required for complex technical evidence

statutes.name: Commercial Code ยง2-207
statutes.title: Additional Terms in Acceptance or Confirmation
statutes.text: A definite and seasonable expression of acceptance or a written confirmation which is sent within a reasonable time operates as an acceptance even though it states terms additional to or different from those offered or agreed upon, unless acceptance is expressly made conditional on assent to the additional or different terms.

statutes.name: Electronic Communications Privacy Act
statutes.title: 18 U.S.C. ยง 2510-2523
statutes.text: Prohibits unauthorized interception of electronic communications and provides privacy protections for stored electronic communications.

definitions.force_majeure: A contractual provision that excuses performance due to unforeseeable circumstances beyond parties' control
definitions.estoppel: Legal principle preventing someone from asserting something contrary to what is implied by previous actions or statements
definitions.jurisdiction: The official power to make legal decisions and judgments within a defined territory or over certain types of legal questions
